org.aslab.om.ros
Class OMRosAPI

java.lang.Object
  org.aslab.om.metacontrol.PlantAPI
      org.aslab.om.ros.OMRosAPI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actuator, Sensor
public class OMRosAPI
extends PlantAPI

provides a concrete implementation for the OMJava.ecl.metacontrol.PlantAPI for the ROS platform

Manages the interaction with the actual monitoring and reconfiguration infrastructure for the metacontroller, which consists of two different Ros nodes

action issues are delegated to the manager @see ReconfigurationManager

Author:
chcorbato

OMRosAPI

public OMRosAPI(org.ros.node.Node n,
                OMcomponentsKB k)
Constructor of the org.aslab.om.metacontrol node. Initializes the subscribers and topis for the I/O with the Ros system, and also creates the ReconfigurationManager, which needs access to the publisher of actions

Parameters:
n - the ROS node
